trails.name: Route of the Cahorros
trails.description: A spectacular route that combines hanging bridges, waterfalls, and narrow gorges. Ideal for a half-day adventure. Not suitable for people with vertigo.

reviews.author: Laura Gómez
reviews.comment: An incredible experience, the guides convey a lot of security and the group atmosphere is very welcoming. Ideal for getting started in hiking and meeting new people.

reviews.author: Carlos Martín
reviews.comment: The routes are well organized, although sometimes they get a bit long for beginners. I would have liked more breaks to rest.

trails.name: Vereda de la Estrella
trails.imageHint: Path next to a river in the mountains
trails.description: One of the most emblematic routes of the Sierra Nevada. It follows old mining trails, offering spectacular views of the north faces of Mulhacén and Veleta.

reviews.author: Ana Rodríguez
reviews.comment: Excellent club, very responsible with mountain safety. You can feel the passion for nature. I will definitely repeat on the next outing.

reviews.author: Miguel Torres
reviews.comment: The route was beautiful but there were too many people on the excursion and that made the pace difficult. It would be better to limit the groups a bit.
